**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-02T21:41:40Z" title="04/02/2015 09:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 2, 2015</time> by Daze**
What sorcery is this
Oooooooh, booooooooy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I'm excited for what it might be!
Meh. I haven't been to impressed with the recent 'surprises'.
Now boarding on platform K...
where's the hypetrain when we need it
Ooh boy! I can't wait to see what it is.
At 99% it will be just some images

maybe "close eye" is a reference to them fixing the [floating eye graphical error](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113637-The-floating-right-eye), and they will announce that on their social media outlets.

> 
> maybe "close eye" is a reference to them fixing the [floating eye graphical error](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113637-The-floating-right-eye), and they will announce that on their social media outlets.

I really hope that they didn't hype their fanbase for such a ""little"" bug fix.
Caaaan't waaait!

I'm going to make a *very* hopeful guess that this has something to do with pushing the release of 1.0 back, adding an intermediate version, or something along those lines. (I'm mostly saying this because I want it to be true, though.)

It'll probably be a '1.0 features' video or set of images...

> 
> I really hope that they didn't hype their fanbase for such a ""little"" bug fix.

Little???!!! This is huge! It has been bothering me sooo much! I have killed kerbals purposefully becuase of it! 

Actually now that I think of it, I have become rather accustomed to the asymmetric eyes....

> 
> Little???!!! This is huge! It has been bothering me sooo much! I have killed kerbals purposefully becuase of it! 
> Actually now that I think of it, I have become rather accustomed to the asymmetric eyes....

Yes is little bug compared to all the HUGE ANNOYING bugs that this game have.
This wont be a 1.0 release they've said plenty of times its not ready and if they actually listened to us then it may be a 0.91 release, however unlikely they actually listened to us.
so maybe its "close" in the way that .91 is "close" to 1.0. and they are [listening to the community here.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108318-Do-you-feel-KSP-is-ready-for-1-0)

LOL at those that think it is a release. The last DevNotes indicated Harvester is still adding new stuff. There will be at LEAST two weeks of no new stuff added before a release.

Might be announcing experimentals, but they never hyped that before.

Last Devnotes... you mean those published on April 1st?
I so wish they'd released 1.0 on april the 1st. There would have been an uproar!

> 
> Last Devnotes... you mean those published on April 1st?

March 31st Mexico time, and UTC time. It was only April 1st from UTC +3 onwards.
